हरियो सागसब्जी र सुन्तला जस्ता फोलेक एसिडयुक्त पौष्टिक खाना खानुहोस्।

en: A dark line may appear down your belly, called 'Linea nigra'.
Dark patches may increase on your face and body.
These are due to hormonal changes and are normal.
It is not a cause for worry.
np: तपाईंको पेटमा कालो रेखा देखिन सक्छ, जसलाई 'लिनिया निग्रा' भनिन्छ।
अनुहार र शरीरमा कालो दागहरू बढ्न सक्छन्।
यी हर्मोन परिवर्तनका कारणले हुन्छन् र सामान्य हुन्।
चिन्ता लिनुपर्ने कुरा होइन।

en: Rub your belly gently with coconut or mustard oil.
Avoid scrubbing the dark patches.
Eat foods rich in vitamins like fruits and vegetables.
np: नरिवल वा तोरीको तेलले आफ्नो पेट बिस्तारै मालिस गर्नुहोस्।
कालो दागमा नरगड्नुहोस्।
फलफूल र तरकारीजस्ता भिटामिनयुक्त खाना खानुहोस्।

en: The dark line on your belly may become more visible.
Dark patches on your body may increase.
Your nipples may become even darker, this is your body getting ready for your baby to breastfeed.
These changes are normal and will gradually fade after delivery.
np: पेटको कालो रेखा अझ स्पष्ट देखिन सक्छ।
शरीरमा कालो दागहरू बढ्न सक्छन्।
स्तनको स्तनवृन्त अझ कालो हुन सक्छ, यो तपाईंको शरीर बच्चालाई स्तनपान दिन तयार हुँदै गरेको संकेत हो।
यी परिवर्तनहरू सामान्य हुन् र प्रसवपछि क्रमशः कम हुँदै जानेछन्।

en: Continue to keep your skin clean and moisturized.
Avoid any harsh soaps or creams on your belly and nipples.
Rest and eat well, your body is preparing for your baby's arrival.
np: छाला सफा र नमीयुक्त राख्न जारी राख्नुस्।
पेट र स्तनवृन्तमा कडा साबुन वा क्रिम नलगाउनुस्।
आराम गर्नुहोस् र राम्ररी खानुहोस्, तपाईंको शरीर बच्चाको आगमनको तयारी गर्दैछ।

sentence: Pregnancy brain (forgetfulness) is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Forgetfulness during pregnancy is quite common, so don't worry, you're not alone!
Try keeping notes and setting reminders to help you stay organized.
Remember to be kind to yourself, as your body and mind are going through a lot of changes right now.
If you feel overwhelmed or extremely forgetful, it's a good idea to chat with your healthcare provider for some extra support.

en: Forgetfulness, which people call 'pregnancy brain', is normal in the beginning of pregnancy.
Hormones and tiredness can make it hard to remember things.
np: गर्भावस्थाको सुरुवातमा बिर्सनेपन सामान्य कुरा हो, जसलाई धेरैले 'प्रेग्नेन्सी ब्रेन(गर्भावस्था मस्तिष्क)' पनि भन्छन्।
हर्मोन परिवर्तन र थकानले कुराहरू सम्झन गाह्रो हुन सक्छ।

en: Rest when you can, even a little nap can help.
Write things down that you need to remember.
Ask family for help if you feel overwhelmed.
Eat well, it helps keep your energy up.
np: जब सक्नुहुन्छ आराम गर्नुस् — केही समय सुत्न पाए पनि फाइदा हुन्छ।
स्मरण गर्नुपर्ने कुराहरू नोट गर्नुहोस्।
धेरै थकाइ वा तनाव महसुस भएमा परिवारसँग सहयोग माग्न नहिचकिचाउनुहोस्।
पोषिलो खाना खानुहोस्, यसले शरीरमा ऊर्जा कायम राख्न मद्दत गर्छ।

en: You might still feel forgetful but it is usually less than before.
Your body is working hard to grow your baby.
np: अहिले पनि अलिअलि बिर्सनेपन हुन सक्छ, तर पहिलेभन्दा कम हुने सम्भावना हुन्छ।
तपाईंको शरीर शिशुको वृद्धि गर्न निकै मेहनत गरिरहेको हुन्छ।

en: Make a list of things to do each day.
Keep things you need in the same place so they are easy to find.
Ask for help if you need it.
np: हरेक दिन गर्नुपर्ने कामहरूको सूची बनाउनुस्।
आवश्यक वस्तुहरू सधैं एउटै स्थानमा राख्नुस् ताकि सजिलै भेटियोस्।
आवश्यक परे सहयोग माग्न नहिचकिचाउनुहोस्।

en: You might feel more tired and forgetful as your baby grows.
It is normal, your body is getting ready for the baby to come.
You might also feel uncomfortable, which can make it hard to focus.
np: शिशु बढ्दै जाँदा तपाईंलाई अझ थकाइ र कुराहरू बिर्सने हुन सक्छ।
यो सामान्य हो, तपाईंको शरीर शिशुको आगमनको तयारी गरिरहेको हुन्छ।
कहिलेकाहीँ असहजता पनि महसुस हुन सक्छ, जसले ध्यान केन्द्रित गर्न गाह्रो बनाउँछ।

en: Take breaks and listen to your body.
Let family help with tasks, they want to support you.
Talk to your health worker if you feel very tired or have worries.
np: बीच–बीचमा विश्राम लिनुहोस् र आफ्नो शरीरको संकेत सुन्नुहोस्।
परिवारलाई काममा सघाउने अवसर दिनुहोस् — उनीहरू तपाईंलाई समर्थन गर्न चाहन्छन्।
धेरै थकित महसुस भएमा वा चिन्ता लागेमा स्वास्थ्यकर्मीसँग सल्लाह लिनुहोस्।

sentence: Weight gain is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Gentle reminder, it's normal to gain weight during the second trimester. Focus on maintaining a balanced diet and staying active.
Listen to your body and don't hesitate to reach out to your healthcare provider if you have any concerns or questions.
Remember, every woman's experience is unique. Trust your instincts and prioritize your well-being.

en: You might not gain much weight at first, this is normal.
You may even lose weight if you have morning sickness.
np: गर्भावस्थाको सुरुवातमा तौल खासै नबढ्न सक्छ — यो सामान्य कुरा हो।
यदि बिहानको वाकवाकी (मर्निङ सिकनेस) छ भने तौल घट्न पनि सक्छ।

en: Eat small, frequent meals to help with nausea.
Focus on eating healthy foods when you feel hungry.
Drink plenty of water to stay hydrated.
np: वाकवाकी कम गर्न अलिकति–अलिकति गरेर पटक–पटक खाना खानुहोस्।
भोक लाग्दा पौष्टिक खाना खाने कुरामा ध्यान दिनुहोस्।
शरीरमा पानीको मात्रा सन्तुलित राख्न प्रशस्त पानी पिउनुहोस्।

en: You may start to gain weight more quickly.
Some women may gain weight too fast or too slow.
np: अब तौल छिटो बढ्न थाल्न सक्छ।
केही महिलाहरूको तौल धेरै छिटो वा धेरै ढिलो बढ्न सक्छ।

en: Eat a variety of foods including fruits, vegetables, and whole grains.
Listen to your body's hunger and fullness cues.
Talk to your health worker if you are worried about your weight.
np: फलफूल, तरकारी र साबुत अन्नजस्ता विविध प्रकारका खानेकुराहरू खानुहोस्।
शरीरलाई भोक लागेको र पेट भरिएको संकेत बुझ्ने प्रयास गर्नुहोस्।
तौलको बारेमा चिन्ता लागेमा स्वास्थ्यकर्मीको सल्लाह लिनुहोस्।

en: You may gain weight more slowly in the last few weeks.
Some swelling in your feet, hands, or face is normal, but sudden, severe swelling needs attention.
np: गर्भावस्थाको अन्तिम केही हप्तामा तौल बढ्ने गति घट्न सक्छ।
खुट्टा, हात वा अनुहारमा सामान्य सूजन हुन सक्छ, तर अचानक र अत्यधिक सूजन देखिएमा ध्यान दिन आवश्यक हुन्छ।

en: Rest with your feet elevated to help with swelling.
Eat balanced meals and stay hydrated.
If you notice sudden, severe swelling, especially in your face or hands, talk to your health worker.
np: सूजन कम गर्न खुट्टा अग्लो स्थानमा राखेर आराम गर्नुहोस्।
सन्तुलित भोजन खानुहोस् र शरीरमा पानीको मात्रा सन्तुलित राख्न पर्याप्त पानी पिउनुहोस्।
यदि अनुहार वा हातमा अचानक र धेरै सूजन देखियो भने स्वास्थ्यकर्मीको सल्लाह लिनुहोस्।

sentence: Foot size increase is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Many mothers experience an increase in foot size during the second trimester, so don't worry, this is quite common.
Remember to wear comfortable shoes and take breaks to elevate your feet if they feel tired or swollen.
If the swelling becomes severe or is accompanied by other symptoms, it's a good idea to mention it to your healthcare provider at your next visit.

en: Your body is starting to change, even your feet!
You may notice your shoes feeling a bit tighter.
np: गर्भावस्थाको सुरुवातमै तपाईंको शरीर परिवर्तन हुँदै जान्छ, खुट्टा पनि फरक महसुस हुन सक्छ।
जुत्ता अलिकति कसिलो महसुस हुन सक्छ।

en: Gently massage your feet to help with any discomfort.
Try not to stand for too long in one place.
If there is swelling that does not go down, please mention it to your health worker.
np: खुट्टामा असजिलो महसुस भएमा हल्का मसाज गर्नुहोस्।
एकै ठाउँमा लामो समयसम्म नउभिनुहोस्।
सूजन घट्दैन भने स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई जानकारी दिनुहोस्।

en: As your baby grows, your body holds more water, which can make your feet a bit bigger.
Your feet might feel sore or tired at the end of the day.
np: तपाईंको बच्चा बढ्दै जाँदा, तपाईंको शरीरमा धेरै पानी जम्मा हुन्छ, जसले गर्दा तपाईंको खुट्टा अलि ठूलो देखिन सक्छ।
दिनको अन्त्यमा खुट्टा दुख्ने वा थाकेको महसुस हुन सक्छ।

en: Rest with your feet up whenever you can.
Wear comfortable shoes that fit well, or switch out your shoes during the day to help with comfort.
If you experience sudden or severe swelling, consult your health worker.
np: सम्भव भएसम्म खुट्टा माथि राखेर आराम गर्न प्रयास गर्नुहोस।
आरामदायी जुत्ता लगाउनुहोस् जुन राम्रोसँग मिल्छ, वा आरामदायी बनाउन दिनको समयमा आफ्नो जुत्ता परिवर्तन गर्नुहोस्।
यदि एक्कासि अत्यधिक सूजन देखिन्छ भने स्वास्थ्यकर्मीको सल्लाह लिनुहोस्।

en: As your baby grows even more, your feet might feel more tired and a bit more swollen than usual.
It is normal to go up a shoe size during this time.
np: शिशु अझै बढ्दै जाँदा खुट्टा सामान्यभन्दा बढी थाकेको वा सून्निएको महसुस हुन सक्छ।
यस समयमा जुत्ताको आकार बढ्नु सामान्य कुरा हो।

en: Rest as much as you can with your feet elevated.
Stretch your legs and wiggle your toes regularly to help with blood flow.
If the swelling in your feet or ankles is very bad, or comes on suddenly, talk to your health worker for advice.
np: सम्भव भएसम्म खुट्टा उचालेर विश्राम लिनुहोस्।
रगतको प्रवाह सहज बनाउन नियमित रूपमा खुट्टा तन्काउनुहोस् र औँलाहरू चलाउनुहोस्।
खुट्टा वा टंकमा सूजन धेरै भयो वा एक्कासि देखापर्‍यो भने स्वास्थ्यकर्मीको सल्लाह लिनुहोस्।

sentence: Dry eyes is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Dry eyes are quite common during the second trimester of pregnancy. Hormonal changes can affect the moisture levels in your eyes.
Make sure to blink regularly, especially when focusing on tasks like reading or using a computer.
Consider using lubricating eye drops recommended by your healthcare provider to relieve discomfort.
Stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water throughout the day.
If your dry eyes become painful or your vision is affected, it's a good idea to mention it to your healthcare provider at your next visit.

en: Dry eyes are common in early pregnancy due to hormonal changes.
It might feel uncomfortable, but it is usually not serious.
np: गर्भावस्थाको सुरुवातमा हर्मोनमा हुने परिवर्तनका कारण आँखामा सुक्खापन हुनु सामान्य हो।
यो असजिलो लाग्न सक्छ, तर प्रायः गम्भीर हुँदैन।

en: Blink often and use a clean, wet cloth to place over your eyes for a few minutes, several times a day.
If it bothers you too much, or if your vision is affected, please talk to your local health worker.
np: दिनमा केहीपटक बारम्बार आँखा झिम्काउनुहोस् र सफा, चिसो कपडा भिजाएर केही मिनेट आँखामा राख्नुहोस्।
धेरै असजिलो लागेमा वा दृष्टिमा असर परेको जस्तो लागेमा नजिकको स्वास्थ्यकर्मीको सल्लाह लिनुहोस्।

en: Dry eyes can continue into the second trimester.
It might feel uncomfortable, but it is usually not serious.
np: सुक्खा आँखा दोस्रो त्रैमासिकसम्म पनि रहन सक्छ।
यो असजिलो लाग्न सक्छ, तर सामान्यतया गम्भीर हुँदैन।

en: Rest your eyes often, and use a clean, wet cloth to place over your eyes for a few minutes, several times a day.
If your eyes become red or painful, or if your vision is affected, please talk to your local health worker.
np: दिनमा केहीपटक आँखालाई विश्राम दिनुहोस्, र केही मिनेटका लागि सफा भिजेको कपडा आँखामा राख्नुहोस्।
यदि आँखामा रातोपन, पीडा वा दृष्टिमा समस्या देखिएमा नजिकको स्वास्थ्यकर्मीको सल्लाह लिनुहोस्।

en: Dry eyes can continue into the third trimester.
It might feel uncomfortable, but it is usually not serious.
np: सुक्खा आँखा तेस्रो त्रैमासिकसम्म पनि रहन सक्छ।
यो असजिलो लाग्न सक्छ, तर सामान्यतया गम्भीर हुँदैन।

en: Rest your eyes often, and use a clean, wet cloth to place over your eyes for a few minutes, several times a day.
If your eyes become red or painful, or if your vision is affected, please talk to your local health worker.
np: दिनमा केहीपटक आँखालाई विश्राम दिनुहोस्, र केही मिनेटका लागि सफा भिजेको कपडा आँखामा राख्नुहोस्।
यदि आँखामा रातोपन, पीडा वा दृष्टिमा असर देखिएमा स्वास्थ्यकर्मीको सल्लाह लिनुहोस्।

sentence: Trouble sleeping is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Many women experience trouble sleeping during the second trimester. It's often due to hormonal changes and physical discomfort.
Try establishing a bedtime routine, such as reading or taking a warm bath before bed.
Consider using pregnancy pillows to support your growing belly and find a comfortable position.
Practice good sleep hygiene, like avoiding screens before bed and keeping your sleep environment dark and quiet.
If your sleep issues persist or are causing you distress, it's a good idea to mention it to your healthcare provider at your next visit.

en: You may have trouble sleeping because of hormone changes.
You may feel too hot or have many thoughts at night.
np: हर्मोनमा हुने परिवर्तनका कारण निद्रा लाग्न गाह्रो हुन सक्छ।
राति धेरै सोचहरू आउन सक्छन् वा धेरै गर्मी महसुस हुन सक्छ।

en: Try sleeping on your left side with a pillow between your knees.
Keep your room cool and dark. A warm bath before bed can help.
Talk to your family if you feel worried. They can support you.
np: आफ्नो घुँडाबीचमा सिरानी राखेर बायाँ कोल्टे परेर सुत्ने प्रयास गर्नुहोस्।
कोठा चिसो र अँध्यारो राख्नुहोस्। सुत्नुअघि न्यानो पानीले नुहाउँदा सहयोग पुग्न सक्छ।
चिन्ता लागेको भएमा परिवारसँग कुरा गर्नुहोस्, उहाँहरूले तपाईंलाई सहयोग गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।

en: Your growing belly may make it hard to find a good sleeping position.
You may have leg cramps or heartburn at night.
np: तपाईंको बढ्दो पेटले आरामदायक सुत्ने अवस्था फेला पार्न गाह्रो बनाउन सक्छ।
राति खुट्टाको मांसपेशी बटारिने (क्र्याम्प) वा छातिमा जलन हुन सक्छ।

en: Try sleeping on your left side with a pillow under your belly and between your knees.
For leg cramps, gently stretch your legs before bed. For heartburn, avoid big meals and spicy food before sleeping.
If you feel the baby move a lot at night, try sleeping during the day when the baby is less active.
np: पेट मुन्तिर र घुँडाबीचमा सिरानी राखेर बायाँ कोल्टे परेर सुत्ने प्रयास गर्नुहोस्।
खुट्टाको मांसपेशी बटारिने समस्याको लागि, सुत्नुअघि आफ्नो खुट्टा बिस्तारै तन्काउनुहोस्। छाती पोल्ने समस्याको लागि सुत्नुअघि भारी खाना र तिखा परिकार नखानुहोस्।
यदि राति बच्चा धेरै चलेको महसुस भएमा, बच्चा कम सक्रिय हुने समयमा (दिउँसो) सुत्न प्रयास गर्नुहोस्।

en: You may feel uncomfortable because of your baby's size.
You may need to go to the toilet many times at night.
np: शिशुको आकार बढ्दै जाँदा शरीरमा असजिलोपन अनुभव हुन सक्छ।
राति बारम्बार शौचालय जानुपर्ने हुन सक्छ।

en: Try sleeping on your left side with pillows to support your belly and back.
Go to the toilet before sleeping to empty your bladder.
If you feel any pain or leak water, speak calmly to your local health worker.
np: आफ्नो पेट र ढाडलाई सहारा दिन तकिया राखेर बायाँ कोल्टे परेर सुत्ने प्रयास गर्नुहोस्।
सुत्नुअघि पिसाब थैली खाली गर्न शौचालय जानुहोस्।
दुखाइ महसुस भएमा वा पानी बगेको जस्तो लागेमा नजिकको स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई शान्त रूपमा जानकारी दिनुहोस्।

sentence: Thicker, shinier hair is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Many women experience changes in their hair during pregnancy, and having thicker, shinier hair is quite common in the second trimester.
This change is usually due to hormonal fluctuations that can prolong the hair growth phase.
Enjoy this benefit of pregnancy! Just remember to continue with your usual hair care routine to keep your scalp healthy.
If you have any concerns or notice any unusual changes, it's always a good idea to mention them to your healthcare provider during your next check-up.

en: Hormones are changing, making your hair look different.
You might notice your hair feels fuller and healthier.
np: हर्मोन परिवर्तन भईरहेका कारण तपाईंको कपाल फरक देखिन सक्छ।
तपाईंलाई आफ्नो कपाल अझ घना र स्वस्थ देखिएको महसुस हुन सक्छ।

en: Enjoy this change, it's a normal part of pregnancy.
Keep your hair clean and tied up if it bothers you.
Don't worry, your hair will go back to normal after your baby is born.
np: यो परिवर्तनको आनन्द लिनुहोस्, यो गर्भावस्थाको सामान्य भाग हो।
कपाल सफा राख्नुहोस् र असजिलो लागेमा बाँध्ने गर्नुहोस्।
चिन्ता नगर्नुहोस्, बच्चा जन्मिएपछि कपाल पुनः सामान्य हुनेछ।

en: Your hair might still be thick and shiny.
Some women also see more hair on their body, like on their arms or face.
np: तपाईंको कपाल अझै पनि घना र चम्किलो देखिन सक्छ।
केही महिलाहरूको शरीरमा, जस्तै हात वा अनुहारमा, बढी रौं देखिन सक्छ।

en: This is normal and usually harmless.
If body hair bothers you, you can talk to your health worker about safe ways to remove it.
Remember, your hair will change again after your baby comes.
np: यो सामान्य हो र प्रायः हानिकारक हुँदैन।
यदि शरीरको रौंले तपाईंलाई सताउँछ भने, आफ्नो स्वास्थ्यकर्मीसँग यसलाई हटाउने सुरक्षित तरिकाहरूको बारेमा कुरा गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।
याद राख्नुहोस्, तपाईंको बच्चा जन्मिएपछि कपाल फेरि परिवर्तन हुनेछ।

en: Your hair might still be thick, but some women see it changing back to normal.
You might see some hair loss, this is your body getting ready for your baby's arrival.
np: तपाईंको कपाल अझै घना हुन सक्छ, तर केही महिलामा कपालले सामान्य रूप लिन थाल्छ।
कपाल झर्ने अनुभव हुन सक्छ, यो तपाईंको शरीरले बच्चाको आगमनको तयारी गरिरहेकोले गर्दा हो।

en: Don't worry, this is normal.
Eat healthy foods to help your body and your baby.
If you're worried about hair loss, talk to your health worker at your next visit.
np: चिन्ता नगर्नुस्, यो सामान्य कुरा हो।
आफ्नो र बच्चाको स्वास्थ्यका लागि पौष्टिक खाना खानुस्।
कपाल झर्ने बारे चिन्ता भएमा आफ्नो अर्को स्वास्थ्यपरीक्षणमा स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई जानकारी दिनुस्।

sentence: Fast-growing nails is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Many women experience faster nail growth during the second trimester due to hormonal changes and increased blood flow.
This is generally a good sign of your body's ability to support your growing baby.

Enjoy this period of healthy growth, but if you notice any unusual changes or if the fast growth is accompanied by pain or discoloration, it's a good idea to mention it to your healthcare provider during your next check-up.

en: Fast-growing nails are common in early pregnancy.
This is due to changes in your body's hormones.
You may also notice changes in your hair growth.
np: गर्भावस्थाको सुरुमा नङ छिटो बढ्नु सामान्य हो।
यो तपाईंको शरीरमा भएका हर्मोन परिवर्तनका कारणले हो।
कपालको बढाइमा पनि परिवर्तन देखिन सक्छ।

en: Trim your nails short to keep them clean and healthy.
If you have any discomfort, soak your nails in warm water.
Eat a variety of fruits, vegetables for healthy nail growth.
np: नङ छोटो काटेर सफा र स्वस्थ राख्नुहोस्।
असजिलो भए नङलाई न्यानो पानीमा भिजाउनुस्।
नङको स्वास्थ्यका लागि विभिन्न फलफूल र तरकारी खानुहोस्।

en: Your nails may continue to grow faster in the middle of your pregnancy.
They might become brittle or break easily.
This is normal and due to the hormones in your body.
np: गर्भावस्थाको मध्यतिर नङ छिटो बढ्न सक्छ।
नङ भाँचिने वा सजिलै फुट्ने हुन सक्छ।
यो सामान्य हो र शरीरका हर्मोनका कारण हुन्छ।

en: Keep your nails short and filed to prevent breaking.
Avoid using harsh soaps or chemicals on your nails.
If your nails are very brittle, talk to your health worker.
np: नङलाई छोटो काटेर सफा र पातलो बनाउनुहोस् ताकि नङ नफाटोस्।
कडा साबुन वा रासायनिक पदार्थ नङमा नलगाउनुहोस्।
यदि नङ धेरै सजिलै फुट्ने भएमा स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई जानकारी दिनुहोस्।

en: In the last stages of pregnancy, your nails may grow even faster.
They might also become softer or bend easily.
This is your body's way of preparing for the baby's arrival.
np: गर्भावस्थाको अन्तिम चरणमा नङ अझ छिटो बढ्न सक्छ।
नङ नरम वा सजिलै मोडिने हुन सक्छ।
यो तपाईंको शरीरले बच्चा जन्माउने तयारी गरिरहेको संकेत हो।

en: Keep your nails clean and trimmed to prevent any discomfort.
If you experience any pain or unusual changes, mention it to your health worker calmly.
Remember, these changes are temporary and will improve after pregnancy.
np: नङ सफा र छोटो राख्नुस् ताकि कुनै असजिलो नहोस्।
दुखाइ वा अनौठो परिवर्तन भएमा शान्त भएर स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई जानकारी दिनुहोस्।
याद राख्नुहोस्, यी परिवर्तन अस्थायी हुन् र गर्भावस्था पछि सुधार हुनेछन्।

sentence: Dry, irritated stomach skin is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Many women experience dry, irritated skin on their stomach during the second trimester—it's quite common due to the stretching of the skin and hormonal changes.
Make sure to keep your skin hydrated by drinking plenty of water and applying moisturizers or oils designed for pregnancy.
Gentle exfoliation can also help, but be sure to use products that are safe for pregnancy.
If the irritation becomes severe or you notice any signs of infection, it's a good idea to check in with your healthcare provider.

en: In the early days of pregnancy, the belly skin may feel dry and irritated as the baby starts to grow.
Hormone changes can also make the skin on the belly feel different.
np: गर्भावस्थाको सुरुवाती दिनहरूमा बच्चा बढ्न थालेपछि पेटको छाला सुख्खा र चिलाउने महसुस हुन सक्छ।
हर्मोन परिवर्तनका कारण पेटको छालामा फरकपन महसुस हुन सक्छ।

en: Apply pure coconut oil or pure mustard oil gently on the belly skin to keep it soft.
Avoid scratching the skin. Instead, pat gently to soothe any itchiness.
Wear loose, comfortable clothes made of cotton to let the skin breathe.
np: पेटको छाला नरम राख्न शुद्ध नरिवलको तेल वा तोरीको तेल बिस्तारै लगाउनुहोस्।
छाला कन्याउनुहुन्न, बरु चिलाएको भए बिस्तारै सुमसुम्याएर शान्त पार्नुहोस्।
छालाले सजिलै सास फेर्न सकोस् भनेर खुकुलो र सुतिको आरामदायक लुगा लगाउनुहोस्।

en: As the baby grows, the skin on the belly stretches and may become dry and irritated.
The growing belly can also cause a line (linea nigra) and slight change in skin color, which is normal.
np: शिशु बढ्दै जाँदा पेटको छाला तन्किँदै जान्छ, जसले गर्दा सुख्खा र चिलाउने हुन सक्छ।
बढ्दो पेटले कालो रेखा (लाइनिया निग्रा) र छालाको रंगमा थोरै परिवर्तन पनि निम्त्याउन सक्छ, जुन सामान्य हो।

en: Rub a small amount of pure coconut oil or pure mustard oil on the belly skin to help with the stretching.
Avoid using harsh soaps or scrubbing too hard while bathing.
Drink plenty of water to stay hydrated and help keep the skin healthy.
np: छाला तन्किँदाको असजिलोपन कम गर्न पेटमा थोरै मात्रामा शुद्ध नरिवलको तेल वा तोरीको तेलले मालिस गर्नुहोस्।
नुहाउँदा कडा साबुन नलगाउनुहोस्, र छालामा धेरै कडा गरी नरगड्नुहोस्।।
छाला स्वस्थ राख्न र शरीर जलयुक्त राख्न प्रशस्त पानी पिउनुहोस्।

en: In the last stages of pregnancy, the belly skin is stretched the most, which can cause dryness and irritation.
Some women may also experience itchiness due to the stretching.
np: गर्भावस्थाको अन्तिम चरणमा पेटको छाला सबैभन्दा बढी तन्किन्छ, जसले सुख्खापन र जलन निम्त्याउन सक्छ।
केही महिलाहरूले छाला तन्किँदा चिलाउने समस्या अनुभव गर्न सक्छन्।

en: Gently apply pure coconut oil or pure mustard oil on the belly skin to moisturize and soothe it.
Avoid hot baths or showers that can dry the skin more. Instead, use warm water.
If the itchiness is very bothersome or you notice any rash or redness, please mention it to your health worker or nurse at your next visit.
np: छालालाई नमी दिन र शान्त पार्न पेटमा शुद्ध नरिवलको तेल वा तोरीको तेलले बिस्तारै मालिस गर्नुहोस्।
छालालाई अझ सुख्खा हुन नदिन तातो पानीले स्नान नगर्नुहोस्, बरु नुहाउँदा न्यानो पानी प्रयोग गर्नुस्।
चिलाउने धेरै भएको भए वा डाबर, रातोपन देखिएमा आफ्नो अर्को स्वास्थ्यजाँचमा स्वास्थ्यकर्मी वा नर्सलाई जानकारी दिनुहोस्।

sentence: Belly button turning "outie" is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Hello mom! Many women experience their belly button turning into an 'outie' during the second trimester.
This is usually normal and happens because your growing uterus is pushing your abdomen forward.
It's important to keep an eye on any changes to your body, so if you notice any pain, swelling, or other concerning symptoms, don't hesitate to reach out to your healthcare provider.

en: Your belly button may not change yet, but you might feel some tightness around it
You may wonder if this is normal
np: गर्भावस्थाको सुरुवातमा तपाईंको नाभीमा खासै परिवर्तन नदेखिए पनि त्यस वरिपरि केही कसिलोपन महसुस हुन सक्छ।
तपाईंलाई यो सामान्य हो कि होइन भन्ने जिज्ञासा हुन सक्छ।

en: This is usually normal as your baby grows.
Make sure to moisturize your belly skin to reduce itching
No need to worry, but you can ask your health worker for advice
np: शिशु बढ्दै जाँदा यस्तो महसुस हुनु सामान्य हो।
पेटको छाला चिलाउन नदिन नियमित रूपमा नमी दिने तेल वा क्रीम लगाउनुस्।
चिन्ता लिनु पर्दैन, तर तपाईं आफ्नो स्वास्थ्यकर्मीसँग सल्लाह लिन सक्नुहुन्छ।

en: Your belly button may start to push out a little as your baby grows
You might feel some discomfort around your belly button
np: शिशु बढ्दै जाँदा तपाईंको नाभी अलिकति बाहिर निस्कन थाल्न सक्छ।
नाभी वरिपरि असजिलो महसुस हुन सक्छ।

en: This is usually normal at this stage
Keep your belly skin clean and moisturized
If you feel pain or discomfort, mention it to your health worker
np: यस चरणमा यो सामान्यतया सामान्य मानिन्छ।
पेटको छाला सफा र नमीयुक्त राख्नुस्।
यदि दुखाइ वा असजिलो महसुस भएमा स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई भन्नुहोस्।

en: Your belly button may become an 'outie' as your baby grows bigger
You might feel some tightness or discomfort around your belly button
np: शिशु ठूलो हुँदै जाँदा तपाईंको नाभी 'आउटी' (बाहिर निस्किएको नाभी) जस्तो देखिन सक्छ।
नाभी वरिपरि कसिलोपन वा असजिलो महसुस हुन सक्छ।

en: This is usually normal and temporary
Keep your belly skin clean and moisturized to avoid itching
If you feel pain or see any changes in color or smell, tell your health worker
np: यो सामान्य र अस्थायी परिवर्तन हो।
चिलाउनबाट बच्न आफ्नो पेटको छाला सफा र नमीयुक्त राख्नुहोस्।
यदि तपाईंलाई दुखाइ महसुस भयो वा रंग वा गन्धमा कुनै परिवर्तन देखियो भने, आफ्नो स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई भन्नुहोस्।

sentence: Brain fog is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Brain fog can be quite common during the second trimester due to hormonal changes and the demands of pregnancy on your body.
Remember to be gentle with yourself and take breaks when needed.
Stay hydrated, eat well, and prioritize rest to help manage this symptom.
If you feel that brain fog is significantly impacting your daily life, it's a good idea to mention it to your healthcare provider at your next appointment.

en: Feeling a bit confused or forgetful? This is common in early pregnancy.
Hormone changes in your body may make you feel this way.
np: के तपाईं अलमलिएको जस्तो वा कुरा बिर्सिन थालेको जस्तो महसुस गर्दै हुनुहुन्छ? गर्भावस्थाको सुरुवातमा यस्तो महसुस हुनु सामान्य हो।
शरीरमा हुने हर्मोन परिवर्तनका कारण यस्तो महसुस हुन सक्छ।

en: Rest when you can, even a short nap can be helpful.
Eat healthy foods and stay hydrated. This can help you feel more alert.
Write down things you need to remember. Ask family to help remind you.
np: सक्दा विश्राम लिनुहोस्, छोटो निद्रा पनि उपयोगी हुन सक्छ।
पोषणयुक्त खाना खानुहोस् र प्रशस्त पानी पिउनुहोस्,जसले तपाईंको ध्यान केन्द्रित राख्न मद्दत गर्छ।
याद राख्नुपर्ने कुराहरू लेखेर राख्नुहोस्, र परिवारलाई सम्झाइदिन अनुरोध गर्नुहोस्।

en: You might still feel forgetful, but it is usually less than before.
If brain fog feels very bad, it might be a sign of low iron or blood sugar.
np: तपाईंलाई अझै पनि बिर्सने बानी महसुस हुन सक्छ, तर यो सामान्यतया पहिले भन्दा कम हुन्छ।
यदि सोचाइ एकदमै धमिलो लाग्छ भने, त्यो आइरन वा रगतमा चिनीको मात्रा कम भएको संकेत हुन सक्छ।

en: Eat a balanced diet with plenty of fruits and vegetables.
If feeling very tired or dizzy, talk to your health worker.
Go for your regular pregnancy check-ups. They will check your blood.
np: प्रचुर मात्रामा फलफूल र सागसब्जी सहितको सन्तुलित आहार लिनुहोस्।
अत्यधिक थकान वा टाउको घुम्ने अनुभव भएमा स्वास्थ्यकर्मीको सल्लाह लिनुहोस्।
रगतको जाँच गरिने भएकाले, नियमित रूपमा गर्भजाँच गराउन जानुहोस्।

en: Feeling forgetful again is normal as your body gets ready for birth.
If you feel very confused or have a bad headache, it might be a sign of high blood pressure.
np: शरीरले बच्चा जन्माउन तयारी गर्दा फेरि बिर्सिने समस्या हुनु सामान्य हो।
यदि धेरै अलमलिएको महसुस हुन्छ वा टाउको धेरै दुख्छ भने उच्च रक्तचापको संकेत हुन सक्छ।

en: Rest and take care of yourself. Let your family help more.
If you have a bad headache, swelling in face or hands, or see spots, tell your health worker right away.
Go for your regular pregnancy check-ups. They will check your blood pressure.
np: विश्राम लिनुहोस् र आफ्नो ख्याल राख्नुहोस्। परिवारका सदस्यहरूलाई अझ बढी सहयोग गर्न दिनुहोस्।
यदि टाउको धेरै दुख्छ, अनुहार वा हात सुन्निन्छ, वा आँखाअघि धब्बाहरू देखिन्छन् भने तुरुन्त स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई भन्नुहोस्।
तपाईंको रक्तचाप जाँच गरिनेछ, त्यसैले नियमित रूपमा गर्भावस्थाको जाँच गर्न जानुहोस्।

sentence: Increased vaginal discharge is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Hello dear, increased vaginal discharge during the second trimester is quite common and usually nothing to worry about.
It's your body's way of preparing for the baby's arrival.
However, if you notice any changes in color, odor, or experience any discomfort, it's a good idea to mention it to your healthcare provider at your next visit.
In the meantime, you might find that wearing a light panty liner helps you feel more comfortable.
Remember, every woman's experience is unique, and it's important to listen to your body and reach out to your healthcare team if you have any concerns.

problem: You may see more discharge, called leucorrhea, which is normal. It should be white or clear, and odorless.
If it's green, yellow, or has a bad smell, it might be an infection.
solution: Keep your genital area clean and dry.
Wear cotton underwear.
If you see colors or smell something unusual, don't worry, but please talk to your local health worker when you can.

problem: Your body produces more discharge to protect your birth canal from infection.
A change in color or smell can still be a sign of infection.
solution: Keep your genital area clean.
Don't use soaps or douches inside your vagina.
If something seems unusual, don't worry, but mention it to your health worker at your next visit.

problem: Your discharge might increase and become thicker as your body prepares for birth.
If it's watery, it could be amniotic fluid. This needs medical attention.
solution: Keep your genital area clean.
If you think it's amniotic fluid, stay calm. Use clean cloth to keep dry, don't insert anything into your vagina, and go to your nearest health post.

sentence: Headaches is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Headaches can be common during the second trimester, so try not to worry too much.
Make sure to stay hydrated and get enough rest.
If the headaches become severe or are accompanied by other symptoms like fever, vomiting, visual disturbances, or sudden weight gain, please contact your healthcare provider right away.

en: Headaches are common in the first few months of pregnancy.
They can be due to hormone changes, stress, or tiredness.
Morning sickness can also cause dehydration which can be the source of headaches.
np: गर्भावस्थाका सुरुआती महिनाहरूमा टाउको दुख्ने समस्या सामान्य हुन्छ।
हर्मोन परिवर्तन, तनाव वा थकानका कारण यस्तो हुन सक्छ।
बिहानबेला वान्ता हुने समस्या (मर्निङ सिकनेस) का कारण शरीरमा पानीको कमी भई टाउको दुख्न सक्छ।

en: Rest and relax - lie down in a quiet, dark room if you can.
Try a cool cloth on your head or a gentle head massage.
Eat small meals throughout the day to keep up your energy and stay hydrated.
If the headache is severe or long-lasting, check with your local health worker.
np: शान्त र अँध्यारो कोठामा विश्राम वा आराम गर्ने प्रयास गर्नुहोस्।
टाउकोमा चिसो कपडा राख्नुहोस् वा हल्का मसाज गर्नुहोस्।
आफ्नो ऊर्जा कायम राख्न दिनभरि अलिअलि गरेर खाना खानुहोस् र शरीरमा पानीको मात्रा सन्तुलित राख्नुहोस्।
यदि टाउको धेरै दुख्छ वा लामो समयसम्म दुखिरहन्छ भने नजिकको स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई देखाउनुहोस्।

en: Headaches in the middle of pregnancy might be from tension, sinuses blocking or lack of sleep.
Your growing baby bump can also cause strain and discomfort in your body and cause headaches.
np: गर्भावस्थाको मध्य समयमा टाउको दुख्ने समस्या तनाव, पिनास वा निद्रा नपुग्दा हुन सक्छ।
बच्चा हुर्कँदै जाँदा बढ्दो पेटको कारणले गर्दा शरीरमा तानाव र असहजता महसुस हुन सक्छ जसले टाउको दुखाइ निम्त्याउन सक्छ।

en: In the last few months, headaches can come from carrying extra weight, not sleeping well, or stress.
If you have a sudden, very bad headache, blurred vision, or vomiting, it could be a sign of high blood pressure, which needs medical attention.
np: गर्भावस्थाका अन्तिम महिनाहरूमा शरीरमा बढी तौल बोक्नुपर्ने, राम्रोसँग सुत्न नपाउने वा तनावका कारणले टाउको दुख्न सक्छ।
यदि अचानक धेरै कडा टाउको दुखाइ, धमिलो देखिने वा बान्ता आउने जस्ता लक्षण देखिएमा यो उच्च रक्तचापको संकेत हुन सक्छ, जसका लागि तुरुन्त स्वास्थ्य सल्लाह आवश्यक हुन्छ।

en: Rest on your left side to improve blood flow.
Try a gentle back or neck rub.
If the headache is severe or you have other worries like blurred vision or sudden swelling, check with your local health worker.
np: रगतको प्रवाह सुधार गर्न बायाँ कोल्टे परेर सुत्नुहोस्।
हल्का रूपमा ढाड वा घाँटीको मसाज गर्नुहोस्।
यदि टाउको धेरै दुख्छ वा धमिलो देखिने, अचानक सुनिने जस्ता अन्य चिन्ताजनक लक्षणहरू देखिन्छन् भने नजिकको स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई देखाउनुहोस्।

sentence: Dwindling libido is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: It's completely normal to experience changes in your libido during the second trimester.
Your body is going through many changes, and it's important to be gentle with yourself.
Open communication with your partner about your feelings can be helpful.
If you have any concerns or questions, it's always a good idea to talk to your healthcare provider.

en: In the first three months, your body is changing and this can make you feel tired or even sick.
It is normal to not have the same feelings of intimacy as before.
np: गर्भावस्थाका पहिलो तीन महिनामा तपाईंको शरीर परिवर्तन भइरहेको हुन्छ जसले गर्दा थकित वा बिरामी महसुस हुन सक्छ।
पहिलेको जस्तो घनिष्टताको भावना नहुनु पूर्ण रूपमा सामान्य हो।

en: Rest when you can, your body is working hard to grow your baby.
Talk openly with your partner about your feelings. You can find other ways to be close, like holding hands or gentle touching.
np: तपाईंको शरीर शिशुलाई हुर्काउन कडा मेहनत गरिरहेको हुन्छ, त्यसैले जति बेला सक्नुहुन्छ विश्राम गर्नुहोस्।
आफ्ना भावनाहरूको बारेमा आफ्ना साझेदारसँग खुलेर कुरा गर्नुहोस्। तपाईं हात समाउने वा कोमल स्पर्श जस्ता नजिक हुने अन्य तरिकाहरू पनि अपनाउन सक्नुहुन्छ।

en: In the middle months, your baby is growing bigger, and this can make you feel tired or even out of breath.
You might feel less interested in intimacy, which is normal.
np: गर्भावस्थाको मध्यम महिनाहरूमा तपाईंको शिशु ठूलो हुँदै जान्छ, जसले गर्दा थकाइ वा सास फेर्न गाह्रो हुने जस्तो महसुस हुन सक्छ।
तपाईंलाई आत्मीयतामा कम रुचि लाग्नु सामान्य हो।

en: Listen to your body and rest when needed.
Share your feelings with your partner. Enjoy other forms of closeness, like talking or spending quiet time together.
np: आफ्नो शरीरको कुरा बुझ्नुहोस् र आवश्यक परेको बेला विश्राम गर्नुहोस्।
आफ्ना भावना आफ्नो साझेदारसँग साझा गर्नुहोस्। कुराकानी गर्नुहोस् वा शान्त समय सँगै बिताएर नजिक हुने अन्य तरिकाहरू अपनाउनुहोस्।

en: In the last three months, your baby is growing quickly, and you might feel heavy or uncomfortable.
It is normal to think more about the baby coming than about intimacy.
np: गर्भावस्थाका अन्तिम तीन महिनामा तपाईंको शिशु छिटो बढिरहेको हुन्छ र तपाईंलाई भारी वा असजिलो लाग्न सक्छ।
नजिकिन भन्दा बच्चा आउने कुरामा बढी सोच्नु सामान्य हो।

en: Take care of yourself and your baby by getting plenty of rest.
Talk with your partner about your feelings. You can find other ways to be close, like talking about your baby or planning for the future together.
np: आफ्नो र शिशुको हेरचाह गर्न धेरै विश्राम गर्नुहोस्
आफ्ना भावना आफ्नो साझेदारसँग साझा गर्नुहोस् शिशु बारे कुरा गर्ने वा भविष्यको योजना बनाउने जस्ता आत्मीयताका अरू तरिका अपनाउनुहोस्।

sentence: Tingling hands (carpal tunnel syndrome) is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Gentle reminder, tingling hands, often due to carpal tunnel syndrome, is quite common in the second trimester.
It's likely due to fluid retention and should resolve after delivery.
To ease discomfort, try shaking your hands, elevating them when possible, and avoiding repetitive motions.
Wearing a wrist splint at night can also help.
If the tingling becomes severe or is accompanied by other concerning symptoms, it's a good idea to mention it to your healthcare provider for peace of mind.

en: You might feel your fingers are asleep (tingling) in early pregnancy.
This is normal for many women due to changes in your body.
It usually happens at night but can also happen during the day.
np: गर्भावस्थाको सुरुवातमा औंलाहरू झमझमाउने वा सुनिएको जस्तो महसुस हुन सक्छ।
शरीरमा हुने परिवर्तनका कारण धेरै महिलाहरूको लागि सामान्य कुरा हो।
यो सामान्यतया राति हुने गर्छ तर दिनको समयमा पनि हुन सक्छ।

en: Try shaking your hands or hanging them over the side of the bed to find relief.
If you have a wristband, you can use that to keep your wrist straight. Ask your husband or family to help you.
Tell your local health worker if the tingling is bothering your daily tasks.
np: आराम पाउनको लागि, हात हल्लाउने वा ओछ्यानको छेउबाट झुन्ड्याएर राख्ने प्रयास गर्नुहोस्।
यदि तपाईंसँग पट्टी (wristband) छ भने, आफ्नो नाडी सीधा राख्न त्यसलाई प्रयोग गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ। श्रीमान् वा परिवारका सदस्यसँग सहयोग माग्नुहोस्।
यदि झमझमाहटले तपाईंको दैनिक काममा बाधा पुर्‍याइरहेको छ भने स्थानीय स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई जानकारी दिनुहोस्।

en: Tingling hands can continue in the middle of your pregnancy.
It might wake you up at night or bother you during the day.
Sometimes, you might drop something because of the tingling.
np: गर्भावस्थाको मध्यम समयमा पनि हात झमझमाउने समस्या जारी रहन सक्छ।
यसले राति तपाईंको निन्द्रा बिथोल्न सक्छ वा दिनको समयमा असहज बनाउन सक्छ।
कहिलेकाहीं झमझमाहटका कारण तपाईंको हातबाट केही खस्न पनि सक्छ।

en: Try to keep your wrists straight when sleeping. Use a wristband if you have one.
If the tingling is making it hard to move your fingers, tell a local health worker. They will be able to help you.
Remember, it's important to tell someone if you're having lots of trouble with your hands during the day.
np: सुत्दा सकेसम्म नाडी सीधा राख्ने प्रयास गर्नुहोस्। तपाईं सँग पट्टी (wristband) छ भने त्यसको प्रयोग गर्नुहोस्।
यदि झमझमाहटका कारण औंला चलाउन गाह्रो भइरहेको छ भने स्थानीय स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई जानकारी दिनुहोस्।
याद राख्नुहोस्, यदि तपाईंलाई दिनभरि हातमा धेरै समस्या भइरहेको छ भने कसैलाई भन्नु महत्त्वपूर्ण हुन्छ।

en: In the last part of your pregnancy, tingling hands can happen more often.
Your body is getting ready for the baby, so this is normal for many women.
Sometimes, the tingling can feel stronger or happen more often.
np: गर्भावस्थाको अन्तिम चरणमा हात झमझमाउने समस्या झन् बढी हुन सक्छ।
शरीर, शिशुको आगमनका लागि तयार भइरहेकाले धेरै महिलामा यो सामान्य हुन्छ।
कहिलेकाहीं झमझमाहट, बढी बलियो महसुस हुन सक्छ वा बारम्बार हुन सक्छ।

en: Try to keep your wrists straight when you can, especially when you're asleep.
If the tingling is very strong or not going away, it's a good idea to talk to your health worker.
Remember, they are there to help you and your baby be healthy and happy.
np: जहिले सक्नुहुन्छ विशेष गरी सुत्दा, नाडी सीधा राख्ने प्रयास गर्नुहोस्।
यदि झमझमाहट धेरै तीव्र छ वा घटिरहेको छैन भने स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई भेट्नुहोस्।
स्वास्थ्यकर्मीहरू, तपाईं र तपाईंको शिशुको स्वास्थ्य र सुखका लागि सधैं तयार हुनुहुन्छ भन्ने कुरा याद राख्नुहोस्।

sentence: Fluid retention (swelling) is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Fluid retention, also known as edema, is quite common during the second trimester of pregnancy.
It's important to stay hydrated and elevate your feet when possible.
If you notice sudden or severe swelling, especially in your face or hands, it's a good idea to contact your healthcare provider for further evaluation.

en: Your body might start to keep a bit more water.
You may see your rings fit tighter or your ankles look fuller.
np: गर्भावस्थाको सुरुवातमा शरीरमा केही पानी जम्न सुरु हुन सक्छ।
औंठी साँघुरो भएको महसुस हुन सक्छ वा खुट्टाको गोलीगाँठो अलि फुलेको देखिन सक्छ।

en: Rest with your feet raised when you can.
Make sure to drink plenty of water.
Avoid standing in one place for too long.
np: जहिले सक्नुहुन्छ खुट्टा उठाएर विश्राम गर्नुहोस्।
पर्याप्त पानी पिउनुहोस्।
धेरै बेर एउटै ठाउँमा नउभिनुहोस्।

en: Swelling may increase, especially in your legs, feet, and fingers.
Your shoes or rings might feel tighter.
np: गर्भावस्थाको दोस्रो त्रैमासिकमा खुट्टा, गोडा र औंलामा सूजन बढ्न सक्छ।
जुत्ता वा औंठी झन् साँघुरो लाग्न सक्छ।

en: Lie down on your left side to rest when you can.
Wear comfortable shoes and clothes.
Gently stretch your legs and feet.
np: जहिले सक्नुहुन्छ बायाँ कोल्टे परेर सुत्नुहोस्।
आरामदायक जुत्ता र लुगा लगाउनुहोस्।
खुट्टा र गोडा विस्तारै तन्काउने अभ्यास गर्नुहोस्।

en: Swelling might be more noticeable, especially in your legs, feet, and even your face.
Your shoes might feel tight.
np: गर्भावस्थाको अन्तिम चरणमा सुन्निने समस्या बढी देखिन सक्छ, विशेष गरी तपाईंको खुट्टा, गोडा र अनुहारमा पनि सूजन स्पष्ट देखिन सक्छ।
जुत्ता साँघुरो लाग्न सक्छ।

en: Lie down on your left side when resting.
Ask family members to help with tasks that require standing for long periods.
If swelling is sudden or severe, especially in your face or hands, calmly tell your local health worker.
np: विश्राम गर्दा बायाँ कोल्टे परेर सुत्नुहोस्।
धेरै बेर उभिनुपर्ने कामहरूमा परिवारको सहयोग लिनुहोस्।
यदि अनुहार वा हातमा अचानक वा धेरै सूजन देखिएमा, शान्त रूपमा आफ्नो स्थानीय स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई जानकारी दिनुहोस्।

sentence: Sleep difficulties is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: It's quite common to experience sleep difficulties during your second trimester. Your body is going through many changes, and this can disrupt your usual sleep patterns.
Try establishing a relaxing bedtime routine, such as reading, taking a warm bath, or practicing gentle prenatal yoga.
Make sure your sleep environment is comfortable, with supportive pillows and a cool, dark room.

If your sleep difficulties persist or are causing you significant distress, it's a good idea to mention them to your healthcare provider. They can offer personalized advice and rule out any underlying issues.

en: You may have trouble sleeping because of the changes in your body.
You might feel too hot or have strange dreams.
np: शरीरमा भएका परिवर्तनका कारण तपाईंलाई निद्रामा समस्या हुन सक्छ।
तपाईंलाई धेरै गर्मी महसुस हुन सक्छ वा अनौठा सपना आउन सक्छन्।

en: Try sleeping on your left side with a pillow between your knees.
Keep your room cool and dark. A gentle breeze from a window or fan can help.
Talk to your family if you feel worried. They can support you.
np: घुँडाबीच तकिया राखेर बायाँ कोल्टे परेर सुत्ने प्रयास गर्नुहोस्।
कोठा चिसो र अँध्यारो राख्नुहोस्। झ्याल वा पंखाबाट आउने हल्का हावाले आराम दिन सक्छ।
चिन्ता लागे परिवारसँग कुरा गर्नुहोस्। उहाँहरूले तपाईंलाई सहयोग गर्नु हुनेछ।

en: Your growing belly might make it hard to find a good sleeping position.
You might have leg cramps or feel your baby move at night.
np: बढ्दो पेटका कारण राम्रो सुत्ने उपयुक्त आसन खोज्न गाह्रो हुन सक्छ।
तपाईंको खुट्टा बाउँडिने समस्या हुन सक्छ वा रातमा तपाईंको बच्चा चलेको महसुस हुन सक्छ।

en: Lie on your left side with a pillow under your belly and between your knees.
Try a glass of warm milk before bed. This can help relax your body. Avoid caffeinated beverages.
Gently massage your legs before sleep to help with cramps.
Remember, feeling your baby move is normal. If it worries you, talk to your local health worker.
np: आफ्नो पेट मुनि र घुँडाको बीचमा तकिया राखेर बायाँ कोल्टे परेर सुत्नुहोस्।
सुत्नुअघि एक गिलास मनतातो दूध पिउनुहोस्। यसले शरीरलाई आराम दिन्छ। कफी वा चियाजस्ता क्याफिनयुक्त पेय पदार्थ नखानुहोस्।
सुत्नुअघि खुट्टाको मांसपेशीमा कोमल रूपमा मालिश गर्नुस् जसले खुट्टा बाउँडिने समस्या कम गर्छ।
याद राख्नुहोस्, तपाईंको शिशुको चाल महसुस हुनु सामान्य हो। चिन्ता लागेमा आफ्नो स्थानीय स्वास्थ्यकर्मीसँग कुरा गर्नुहोस्।

en: You might feel uncomfortable because of your baby's size.
You might need to use the toilet more at night.
np: शिशुको आकारका कारण असजिलो महसुस हुन सक्छ।
रातमा धेरै पटक शौचालय प्रयोग गर्नुपर्ने हुन सक्छ।

en: Sleep on your left side with pillows to support your belly and back.
Use the toilet before going to bed to help reduce nighttime trips.
Try taking naps during the day if night sleep is difficult.
If you feel much discomfort or worry, it's okay to talk to your health worker.
np: आफ्नो पेट र पिठ्यु सम्हाल्न तकिया राखेर बायाँ कोल्टे परेर सुत्नुहोस्।
रातिको समयमा बारम्बार जान नपरोस् भनेर सुत्नुअघि नै शौचालय जानुहोस्।
यदि रातमा निदाउन गाह्रो भए दिनमा एकछिन झप्की लिने प्रयास गर्नुहोस्।
धेरै असजिलो वा चिन्ता लागेमा स्वास्थ्यकर्मीसँग कुरा गर्नुहोस्।

sentence: Mild itchiness in hands and feet is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
symptom: Mild itchiness in hands and feet
recommendation_to_mother: Mild itchiness in your hands and feet can be quite common during the second trimester.
It's often due to hormonal changes and the natural stretching of your skin.
To help alleviate the itchiness, try moisturizing your skin regularly with a gentle, unscented lotion.
You might also find relief by wearing loose, breathable clothing and avoiding hot showers or baths.
If the itchiness becomes severe or is accompanied by other symptoms, it's a good idea to mention it to your healthcare provider at your next visit.
In the meantime, focus on staying comfortable and enjoying your pregnancy journey.

en: Itchy hands and feet are usually not a problem in the first few months.
It might just be dry skin.
np: गर्भावस्थाका पहिलो केही महिनामा हात र खुट्टा चिलाउने समस्या सामान्यतया हुँदैन।
यो केवल सुक्खा छालाका कारण हुन सक्छ।

en: Try using a gentle moisturizer like coconut oil.
Drink plenty of water to stay hydrated.
If it gets worse, mention it to your health worker at your next visit.
np: नारिवलको तेलजस्तो कोमल क्रिम प्रयोग गर्नुहोस्, जसले छालालाई ओसिलो राख्न मद्दत गर्छ।
शरीरमा पानीको मात्रा पर्याप्त रहोस् भनेर धेरै पानी पिउनुहोस्।
यदि चिलाउने समस्या बढ्दै गयो भने, अर्को चेकजाँचको समयमा स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई जानकारी दिनुहोस्।

en: In the middle months, itching can happen more often.
It might be normal, but it can sometimes be a sign of a liver problem in pregnancy.
np: गर्भावस्थाको मध्य महिनाहरूमा चिलाउने समस्या बढी हुन सक्छ।
यो सामान्य हुन सक्छ, तर कहिलेकाहीं यो गर्भावस्थामा, कलेजोको समस्या भएको संकेत पनि हुन सक्छ।

en: Keep your skin moisturized.
If itching is severe, especially on your palms and soles, tell your health worker soon.
np: आफ्नो छालालाई ओसिलो राख्नुहोस्।
यदि चिलाउने समस्या धेरै छ, विशेषगरी हत्केला र खुट्टाको तलतिर, भने चाँडै स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई जानकारी दिनुहोस्।

en: Itching in the last few months can be a sign of a liver problem in pregnancy.
It might be a condition called obstetric cholestasis, which needs to be checked by a health worker.
np: गर्भावस्थाको अन्तिम चरणमा चिलाउने समस्या, कहिलेकाहीं कलेजोसँग सम्बन्धित रोगको संकेत हुन सक्छ।
यो 'अव्स्टेट्रिक कोलेस्टेसिस' भन्ने अवस्था हुन सक्छ, जसको परीक्षण स्वास्थ्यकर्मीले गर्नु आवश्यक हुन्छ।

en: Let your health worker know if you have itching, especially if it is severe or with yellow eyes or dark urine.
In the meantime, keep your skin moisturized with a gentle lotion.
np: चिलाउने समस्या भएमा, विशेष गरी आँखा पहेँलो देखिएको वा पिसाव गाढा भएको भए, तुरुन्तै स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई जानकारी दिनुहोस्।
त्यसबीचमा, कोमल लोसन प्रयोग गरेर छालालाई ओसिलो राख्नुहोस्।

sentence: Bleeding gums is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Gentle brushing and flossing can help manage bleeding gums, which are common in the second trimester.
Consider using a soft toothbrush and maintain regular dental check-ups.
If you notice excessive bleeding or have concerns, it's always a good idea to mention it to your healthcare provider.

problem: Bleeding gums is common and usually not serious.
Hormone changes can cause gums to swell and bleed.
Bleeding gum can be because you are not cleaning your teeth after every meal.
solution: Brush your teeth softly after every meal with a soft toothbrush.
Try to eat fruits and vegetables, they help keep your mouth healthy and clean.
If bleeding is heavy or does not stop, tell your health worker.

problem: Bleeding gums can still happen because of hormonal changes.
Your gums may be more sensitive and bleed when you brush or floss.
It can also be a sign of not getting enough good food for you and the baby.
solution: Eat plenty of fruits and vegetables to keep you and your baby healthy.
Brush your teeth softly and rinse your mouth with clean water after every meal.
If bleeding gets worse, talk to your health worker.

problem: Bleeding gums can still happen but should be less of a problem.
If you have bleeding gums and pain it could be a sign of a problem with your teeth.
It can also be a sign of not getting enough good food for you and the baby.
solution: Keep brushing your teeth softly after every meal.
Eat plenty of fruits and vegetables.
If you have pain or the bleeding is heavy, tell your health worker.

sentence: Leg cramps is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Leg cramps are quite common in the second trimester of pregnancy.
They can be uncomfortable, but usually aren't a cause for concern.
Try gentle stretches, stay hydrated, and get regular exercise to help alleviate them.
If the cramps become severe or are accompanied by other symptoms like swelling or pain, it's a good idea to mention it to your healthcare provider.

problem: Leg cramps are common as your body changes.
They can happen at night and wake you up.
solution: Gently stretch your legs before bed.
Massage your legs with warm oil.
Walking a little each day can also help.

problem: Leg cramps can be more frequent as your baby grows.
They might feel stronger and come more often.
solution: Try a warm cloth on the cramped area.
Gently move or massage your leg.
Drink plenty of water daily.
If very bothersome, mention it at your next check-up.

problem: Leg cramps can be even more common now.
The extra weight can make your legs feel tired and cramped.
solution: Rest with your feet up when you can.
Gently move your legs and point your toes up and down.
A warm bath or warm cloth on your legs can help.
Mention frequent cramps to your health worker at your next visit.

sentence: Skin changes (melasma, linea nigra) is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
nepali: छालामा परिवर्तन (चेहरामा कालो दाग, पेटमा कालो रेखा)
recommendation_to_mother: Skin changes like melasma and linea nigra are quite common during the second trimester of pregnancy.
These changes are usually harmless and often fade after pregnancy.
Remember to wear sunscreen and protective clothing when outdoors to help minimize melasma.
If the skin changes are causing you discomfort or concern, feel free to discuss them with your healthcare provider.

problem: You may see some dark patches on your face. This is called melasma.
A dark line on your belly, called linea nigra, may start to show.
solution: These skin changes are normal. Use a gentle soap for your face.
The line on your belly is a normal part of pregnancy. Keep your skin clean and moisturized.
Avoid too much sun. Wear a hat and loose, comfortable clothing when outdoors.

problem: The dark patches on your face (melasma) may get darker.
The line on your belly (linea nigra) may become more visible.
solution: Gently wash and pat dry your face daily. Avoid scrubbing.
The line on your belly is normal. Keep your skin clean and moisturized.
Use a mild soap and avoid chemicals or strong smells on your skin.

problem: The dark patches on your face (melasma) may continue to darken.
The line on your belly (linea nigra) will be very visible now.
You may also see stretch marks on your belly or breasts.
solution: Continue to gently wash your face and avoid the sun.
Keep your skin clean and moisturized. The line on your belly is normal.
Stretch marks are also normal. Eat well and drink plenty of water.

sentence: Round ligament pain is a common symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
nepali: पेट वा कुपर क्षेत्रमा चर्को दुखाइ (लिगामेन्ट तन्कनु)
recommendation_to_mother: Round ligament pain is quite common during the second trimester, so try not to worry too much.
It usually feels like a sharp, sudden spasm or a dull, lingering ache in your lower abdomen or groin area.
To ease discomfort, try changing your position slowly, resting on your side, or practicing good posture.
Gentle exercises and prenatal yoga can also help strengthen your body and reduce pain.
If the pain becomes severe or is accompanied by other symptoms like fever, chills, or burning during urination, it's important to contact your healthcare provider.

problem: You may feel some pain in your lower belly or groin area.
This is called round ligament pain, which is normal as your baby grows.
solution: Rest when you can, especially when the pain is strong.
Change your position slowly, especially when standing or sitting.
You can also try gentle back rubs for relief.

problem: In this stage, round ligament pain can feel like a spasm or sharp pain.
It may happen more often as your baby and belly grow.
solution: Try lying down on the side where you feel the pain, this may provide comfort.
Wear a maternity belt or use a long cloth to wrap around your lower belly for support.
A warm bath or compress may also help you feel better.

problem: The pain may become more frequent as your baby prepares for birth.
It might feel like a strong, sudden pain in your lower belly or groin.
solution: Practice good posture and avoid standing for too long.
Gentle exercises, like walking, can help strengthen your body.
If the pain is very strong or you have other concerns, calmly visit your local health worker for advice.

sentence: Intense itchiness in hands and feet (cholestasis of pregnancy) is a concerning symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
symptom: Intense itchiness in hands and feet (cholestasis of pregnancy)
nepali: हात र खुट्टामा तीव्र चिलाउने (गर्भावस्थाको कोलेस्टासिस)
recommendation_to_mother: We understand that you might be experiencing some discomfort with intense itchiness in your hands and feet.
This symptom, especially in the second trimester, can sometimes be a sign of a condition called cholestasis of pregnancy.
It's important to take this seriously. Please contact your healthcare provider soon so they can evaluate your symptoms and provide the best care for you and your baby.
In the meantime, try to stay comfortable and hydrated. Your healthcare provider may recommend some tests to ensure everything is okay.

en: It is normal to have some itching due to hormonal changes.
However, if you have severe itching on your hands and feet, especially at night, it could be a sign of a condition called cholestasis of pregnancy.
This condition affects your liver and can cause itching, particularly in the hands and feet.
np: हर्मोन परिवर्तनका कारण केही चिलाउने समस्या हुनु सामान्य हो।
तर, यदि तपाईंलाई हात र खुट्टामा, विशेष गरी रातिको समयमा, धेरै चिलाउने समस्या हुन्छ भने, त्यो गर्भावस्थामा हुने 'कोलेस्टेसिस' भन्ने अवस्थाको संकेत हुन सक्छ।
यो अवस्थाले कलेजोलाई असर गर्न सक्छ र मुख्य रूपमा हात र खुट्टामा चिलाउने समस्या हुन सक्छ।

en: Try applying a soothing lotion or cool washcloth to the affected areas.
If the itching is severe or you notice a change in the color of your urine or stool, please consult your local health worker or visit the nearest health post calmly.
They might suggest some blood tests to check your liver function.
np: चिलाएको भागमा आराम दिने प्रकारको लोसन वा चिसो पानीको कपडा प्रयोग गर्नुहोस्।
यदि चिलाउने समस्या धेरै छ वा तपाईंले आफ्नो पिसाब वा दिसाको रंगमा परिवर्तन देख्नुभयो भने, कृपया आफ्नो स्थानीय स्वास्थ्यकर्मीसँग परामर्श गर्नुहोस् वा नजिकैको स्वास्थ्य चौकीमा शान्तपूर्वक जानुहोस्।
स्वास्थ्यकर्मीले तपाईंको कलेजोको कार्यस्थिति बुझ्न केही रगत परीक्षण गर्न सल्लाह दिन सक्नुहुन्छ।

en: As your baby grows, hormonal changes and the increasing size of your uterus can sometimes affect your liver, causing cholestasis of pregnancy.
This condition can lead to intense itching on your hands and feet, which may be worse at night.
It is important to address this issue to ensure the health of your baby.
np: तपाईंको शिशु बढ्दै जाँदा, हर्मोनको परिवर्तन र गर्भाशयको बढ्दो आकारले कहिलेकाहीं तपाईंको कलेजोलाई असर गर्न सक्छ, जसले गर्दा गर्भावस्थामा 'कोलेस्टेसिस' हुन सक्छ।
यस अवस्थाले हात र खुट्टामा तीव्र चिलाउने समस्या ल्याउन सक्छ, जुन रातिको समयमा झन् बढ्न सक्छ।
शिशुको स्वास्थ्यका लागि यो समस्या बेलैमा समाधान गर्नु आवश्यक हुन्छ।

en: Applying a gentle, fragrance-free moisturizer can help soothe the itching.
If the itching is severe or you notice any changes in your urine or stool color, it is a good idea to talk to your local health worker or visit the nearest health post calmly.
They may recommend some medications to help with the itching and monitor your liver function.
np: सुगन्धरहित कोमल क्रिम प्रयोग गर्दा चिलाउने समस्या कम हुन सक्छ।
यदि चिलाउने समस्या धेरै छ वा तपाईंले आफ्नो पिसाब वा दिसाको रंगमा परिवर्तन देख्नुभयो भने, नजिकको स्वास्थ्य संस्था जानुहोस् वा स्थानीय स्वास्थ्यकर्मीको सल्लाह लिनुहोस्।
स्वास्थ्यकर्मीले, चिलाउने समस्या कम गर्न केही औषधि सिफारिस गर्न सक्छन् र कलेजोको कार्यसम्पादन नियमित रूपमा जाँच गर्न सक्छन्।

en: In the last stages of pregnancy, cholestasis can still occur, causing intense itching on your hands and feet.
This condition needs to be monitored as it can affect your baby's health if not addressed.
It is important to pay attention to any changes in your body during this time.
np: गर्भावस्थाको अन्तिम चरणमा पनि कोलेस्टेसिसको अवस्था देखिन सक्छ, जसले हात र खुट्टामा अत्यधिक चिलाउने समस्या ल्याउन सक्छ।
यस अवस्थाको निगरानी आवश्यक हुन्छ, किनभने समयमै उपचार नगरेमा यसले शिशुको स्वास्थ्यमा असर पार्न सक्छ।
यो समयमा शरीरमा देखिने कुनै पनि परिवर्तनप्रति ध्यान दिनु आवश्यक हुन्छ।

en: You can try soaking your hands and feet in cool water for relief.
If the itching becomes unbearable or you notice any other unusual symptoms, calmly consult your local health worker or visit the nearest health post.
They might want to keep a closer eye on your pregnancy and perform some tests to check your liver function.
np: आरामको लागि तपाईं आफ्नो हात र खुट्टा चिसो पानीमा भिजाएर राहत लिन सक्नुहुन्छ।
यदि चिलाउने अत्यधिक हुन्छ वा अन्य असामान्य लक्षणहरू देखिन्छन् भने, कृपया शान्तपूर्वक स्थानीय स्वास्थ्यकर्मीको सल्लाह लिनुहोस् वा नजिकको स्वास्थ्य संस्था जानुहोस्।
उनीहरूले तपाईंको गर्भअवस्थाको निगरानी बढाउन सक्छन् र कलेजोको परीक्षणका लागि केही परीक्षणहरू गर्न सिफारिस गर्न सक्छन्।

sentence: Severe abdominal pain is a concerning symptom in second_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: We understand that you might be feeling worried right now, but it's important to stay calm.
Severe abdominal pain during your second trimester can be concerning, so it's crucial to contact your healthcare provider immediately.
Your health and your baby's well-being are the top priorities. Please don't hesitate to seek medical attention right away.
Remember, it's always better to err on the side of caution. Your healthcare provider is there to support you and ensure everything is okay.
While waiting to see your provider, try to stay hydrated and avoid any strenuous activities. Your comfort and safety are paramount.

en: You are feeling very bad pain in your belly.
This could be a sign that something might not be right.
np: पेटमा धेरै तेज दुखाइ महसुस हुन सक्छ।
यो कहिलेकाहीं शरीरमा केही समस्या भएको संकेत पनि हुन सक्छ।

en: Try to lie down and rest quietly for a while.
If the pain is very bad or does not go away, it is important to see a health worker soon. There are some rare problems that can cause bad pain, like an ectopic pregnancy, that need medical care.
Drink some water and try to relax.
Ask someone to go with you to the health post if you can.
np: केही समय शान्तपूर्वक सुत्ने र आराम गर्ने प्रयास गर्नुहोस्।

दुखाइ धेरै बढेमा वा केही समयसम्म पनी कम नभएमा ढिलो नगरी स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई देखाउनुहोस्। केही दुर्लभ अवस्थाहरू (जस्तै गर्भ पाठेघरबाहिर बस्ने अवस्था, एक्टोपिक प्रेग्नेन्सी) ले यस्तो दुखाइ गराउन सक्छ, जसका लागि उपचार आवश्यक पर्छ।
पानी खानुहोस् र शरीरलाई आराम दिनुहोस्।
यदि सक्नुहुन्छ भने कसैलाई तपाईंको साथमा स्वास्थ्य चौकी जान अनुरोध गर्नुहोस्।

en: You are feeling very bad pain in your belly.
This could be a sign of a problem with the pregnancy, like a urinary tract infection or preterm labor.
np: पेटमा धेरै दुखाइ हुन सक्छ।
यो गर्भावस्थासँग सम्बन्धित समस्या, जस्तै पिसाब नलीको संक्रमण वा समयभन्दा अघि सुत्केरी सुरु हुने अवस्थाको संकेत हुन सक्छ।

en: Try to lie down on your left side and rest.
Drink plenty of water.
If the pain does not go away or is very bad, see a health worker soon.
Ask your family to help you get to the health post if you can.
np: आफ्नो बायाँ कोल्टे परेर आराम गर्ने प्रयास गर्नुहोस्।
प्रशस्त पानी पिउनुहोस्।
यदि दुखाइ कम नहुने वा झनै बढ्ने अवस्था छ भने ढिलो नगरी स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई देखाउनुहोस्।
सक्नुहुन्छ भने, परिवारका सदस्यसँग स्वास्थ्य संस्थामा जान सहयोग माग्नुहोस्।

en: You are feeling very bad pain in your belly.
This could be a sign of labor starting, or a problem like preeclampsia, a urinary tract infection, or a problem with the placenta.
np: गर्भावस्थाको अन्तिम चरणमा पेटमा धेरै दुखाइ महसुस हुन सक्छ।
यो सुत्केरी सुरु हुने संकेत पनि हुन सक्छ, वा प्रि-इक्लेम्प्सिया, पिसाब संक्रमण वा प्लासेन्टासम्बन्धी समस्या पनि हुन सक्छ।

en: Try to lie down on your left side and rest.
Drink plenty of water.
If the pain is very bad or does not go away, see a health worker soon.
Ask your family to help you get to the health post. If you are more than 37 weeks pregnant, it might be time for your baby to come, so be ready to go to the birthing center.
np: आफ्नो बायाँ कोल्टे परेर आराम गर्ने प्रयास गर्नुहोस्।
प्रशस्त पानी पिउनुहोस्।
यदि दुखाइ कम नहुने वा झनै बढ्ने अवस्था छ भने ढिलो नगरी स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई देखाउनुहोस्।
सक्नुहुन्छ भने, स्वास्थ्य संस्थामा जानका लागि परिवारको सहयोग लिनुहोस्। यदि तपाईंको गर्भअवधि ३७ हप्ता नाघेको छ भने शिशु जन्मिन लागेको हुन सक्छ, त्यसैले सुत्केरी सेवा केन्द्र जान तयार हुनुहोस्।

sentence: Braxton Hicks contractions is a common symptom in third_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Experiencing Braxton Hicks contractions is quite common in the third trimester, so there's no need to worry!
These contractions are your body's way of preparing for labor.
Remember to stay hydrated, change positions, or take a warm bath to ease any discomfort.
If the contractions become more frequent, or are accompanied by other symptoms like abdominal pain or bleeding, it's a good idea to check in with your healthcare provider just to be safe.

en: You might feel your belly getting hard, then soft again. This is called Braxton Hicks.
It is normal to have these 'practice' contractions, but they should not be painful.
np: पेट कहिलेकाहीं कडा भएजस्तो अनि फेरि नरम भएको महसुस हुन सक्छ। यसलाई ब्र्याक्सटन हिक्स भनिन्छ।
यो प्रकारका 'अभ्यास' गर्भसङ्कोचनहरू सामान्य हुन्, तर दुख्ने हुनु हुँदैन।

en: Rest and relax. These are just your body's way of getting ready for birth.
Drink plenty of water.
If you have pain or more than 4 contractions in an hour, talk to your health worker.
np: विश्राम गर्नुहोस् र शरीरलाई आराम दिनुहोस्। यो, शरीरले बच्चा जन्माउनको लागि गर्ने तयारीको संकेत हो।
प्रशस्त पानी पिउनुहोस्।
यदि दुखाइ हुन्छ वा एक घण्टामा चारभन्दा बढी सङ्कोचन हुन्छ भने, स्वास्थ्यकर्मीसँग सल्लाह लिनुहोस्।

en: Braxton Hicks contractions might be more noticeable now.
They should still be painless and not very frequent.
np: अब ब्र्याक्सटन हिक्स गर्भसङ्कोचनहरू अझ स्पष्ट महसुस हुन सक्छ।
यी गर्भसङ्कोचनहरू अझै पनि पीडारहित र धेरै पटक नदोहरिने हुनु आवश्यक छ।

en: Continue with your daily activities if you can.
Stay hydrated. Sometimes, these contractions can be a sign of dehydration.
If contractions are regular and painful, getting closer together, or if you have other concerns, it's a good idea to see your health worker.
np: सक्नुहुन्छ भने आफ्नो दैनिक कार्यहरू यथावत् गर्दै जानुहोस्।
शरीरलाई नमीयुक्त राख्न प्रशस्त पानी पिउनुहोस्। कहिलेकाहीं यस्ता सङ्कोचनहरू, शरीरमा पानीको कमीको संकेत पनि हुन सक्छ।
यदि सङ्कोचनहरू नियमित, पीडादायक, र छोटो छोटो अन्तरालमा भइरहेका छन् भने, वा तपाईंलाई अन्य कुनै चिन्ता छ भने, आफ्नो स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई भेट्नु राम्रो विचार हो।

en: Braxton Hicks contractions are more common now. They are helping your body prepare for labor.
Sometimes, it can be hard to tell the difference between these and real labor contractions.
np: अब ब्र्याक्सटन हिक्स गर्भसङ्कोचनहरू बढी देखिन सक्छन्। यी, शरीरलाई प्रसवको तयारी गराउन सहयोग पुर्‍याउँछन्।
कहिलेकाहीं यी र वास्तविक प्रसवको सङ्कोचनबीचको भिन्नता छुट्याउन गाह्रो हुन सक्छ।

en: Try changing your position or activity to see if the contractions stop.
Keep an eye on how often they come. If they become regular and painful, it might be real labor. Talk to your health worker.
Remember, it's normal for Braxton Hicks to happen more often as your baby grows.
np: स्थिति वा गतिविधि परिवर्तन गरेर हेर्नुहोस् — यदि सङ्कोचन रोकियो भने त्यो ब्र्याक्सटन हिक्स नै हो।
सङ्कोचन कति पटक भइरहेको छ भन्नेमा ध्यान दिनुहोस्। यदि यी नियमित र पीडादायक छन् भने त्यो साच्चिकै प्रसव सुरु हुने संकेत हुन सक्छ। स्वास्थ्यकर्मीसँग तुरुन्तै कुरा गर्नुहोस्।
शिशु बढ्दै जाँदा ब्र्याक्सटन हिक्स गर्भसङ्कोचन बढी हुनु सामान्य हो भन्ने कुरा याद राख्नुहोस्।

sentence: Shortness of breath is a common symptom in third_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Feeling a bit short of breath is quite common in the third trimester, as your baby is growing and pressing on your diaphragm.
Try to take it easy and rest when you need to.
If you feel suddenly out of breath or have chest tightness even after resting, please call your healthcare provider right away.
Remember, it's important to listen to your body and not overexert yourself during this time.

en: You may feel short of breath as your body needs more oxygen.
This is usually normal, but it can also be due to anemia (lack of blood).
np: शरीरलाई बढी अक्सिजन चाहिने भएकाले तपाईंलाई सास फेर्न गाह्रो हुन सक्छ।
यो सामान्य कुरा हो, तर कहिलेकाहीं रगतको कमी (एनेमिया) का कारण पनि हुन सक्छ।

en: Rest when you need to.
Eat iron-rich foods like leafy greens, beans, and meat if you can. Please consult your local health worker for advice on diet.
If you feel very tired, dizzy, or have a fast heartbeat, please talk to your health worker.
np: जति बेला थकाइ लाग्छ, त्यति बेला विश्राम लिनुहोस्।
सक्नुहुन्छ भने, सागसब्जी, भटमास, मासुजस्ता आइरनयुक्त खानेकुरा खानुहोस्। खानपानबारे सल्लाहका लागि आफ्नो स्थानीय स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई भेट गर्नुहोस्।
यदि अत्यधिक थकाइ, टाउको घुम्ने, वा मुटु तीव्र रूपमा धड्किने जस्ता लक्षण देखिएमा, कृपया स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई देखाउनुहोस्।

en: Your growing baby bump can push on your lungs, making you feel short of breath.
This is usually normal, but it can also be due to anemia.
np: बढ्दो पेटले फोक्सोमा दबाब दिन सक्छ, जसले गर्दा सास फेर्न गाह्रो हुन सक्छ।
यो सामान्य हो, तर कहिलेकाहीं रगतको कमीका कारण पनि हुन सक्छ।

en: Give yourself time to rest.
Sleep on your side with a pillow behind your back for support.
If you feel very tired, dizzy, or have a fast heartbeat, please talk to your health worker.
np: स्वस्थ रहन समय–समयमा विश्राम लिनुहोस्।
सुत्दा शरीरलाई टेवा दिन ढाड पछाडि सिरानी राखेर कोल्टे परेर सुत्नुहोस्।
यदि धेरै थकाइ, टाउको झ्याम्मिने, वा मुटु छिटो धड्किने जस्ता समस्या महसुस भएमा स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई तुरुन्तै भन्नुहोस्।

en: Your baby is growing bigger, so your lungs have less space.
This is usually normal, but if it's sudden or severe, it could be a sign of something else.
np: शिशु ठूलो हुँदै गएपछि फोक्सोका लागि स्थान कम हुन सक्छ, जसले गर्दा सास फेर्न गाह्रो हुन सक्छ।
यो सामान्य हो, तर यदि अचानक वा धेरै गम्भीर रूपमा देखिन्छ भने यो अन्य समस्याको संकेत हुन सक्छ।

en: Take breaks and rest during the day.
Sleep on your side with a pillow behind your back for support.
If you feel very tired, dizzy, or have a fast heartbeat, or if the shortness of breath is sudden or severe, please talk to your health worker.
np: दिनभरि बीच–बीचमा विश्राम लिनुहोस्।
सुत्दा शरीरलाई टेवा दिन ढाड पछाडि सिरानी राखेर कोल्टे परेर सुत्नुहोस्।
यदि अत्यधिक थकाइ, टाउको चक्कर लाग्ने, मुटु तीव्र गतिमा धड्किने, वा सास फेर्न गाह्रो भएको अवस्था, एक्कासि र गम्भीर रूपमा देखियो भने तुरुन्तै स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई सम्पर्क गर्नुहोस्।

sentence: Heartburn is a common symptom in third_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Heartburn is quite common in the third trimester, so try not to worry.
To ease your discomfort, try eating smaller, more frequent meals and avoid trigger foods like spicy or fatty foods.
Remember to sit upright after eating and elevate the head of your bed when sleeping.
If your heartburn is severe or causing you significant discomfort, please reach out to your healthcare provider for additional support.

en: Heartburn is common and usually nothing to worry about.
It may feel like a burning in your chest or throat.
np: गर्भावस्थाको सुरुमा अमिलो डकार आउनु (छाती पोल्ने समस्या) सामान्य हुन्छ र धेरैजसो अवस्थामा चिन्ताको विषय हुँदैन।
यसमा छाती वा घाँटी पोलिरहेको जस्तो महसुस हुन सक्छ।

en: Try eating smaller meals throughout the day instead of large ones.
Avoid trigger foods like spicy, fried, or fatty foods.
Sleep propped up on pillows to help prevent heartburn at night.
np: दिनभरि सानो-सानो मात्रामा खाना खाने प्रयास गर्नुहोस्, एकैपटक धेरै नखानुहोस्।
मसालेदार, भुटेका वा धेरै बोसोयुक्त खाना जस्ता अमिलो डकार गराउने खानेकुरा नखानुहोस्।
राति सुत्दा सिरानी थपेर टाउको अग्लो बनाएर सुत्नुहोस्, यसले अमिलो डकार कम गर्न सहयोग गर्छ।

en: Heartburn can continue or start in this stage due to your growing baby.
It might feel like a strong burning sensation in your chest.
np: शिशु बढ्दै गएसँगै यस चरणमा अमिलो डकार आउने (छाती पोल्ने) समस्या सुरु हुन सक्छ वा जारी रहन सक्छ।
यसले छातीमा तीव्र पोलिरहेको महसुस गराउन सक्छ।

en: Eat slowly and avoid lying down right after eating.
Wear loose-fitting clothes to reduce pressure on your stomach.
If heartburn is severe, talk to your local health worker.
np: खाना विस्तारै खानुहोस् र खाएपछि तुरुन्तै सुत्न नजानुहोस्।
पेटमा चाप नपर्ने गरी फुक्का लुगा लगाउनुहोस्।
यदि अमिलो डकार धेरै भएको छ भने, नजिकको स्वास्थ्यकर्मीको सल्लाह लिनुहोस्।

en: Heartburn can be quite common as your baby grows bigger.
It might disrupt your sleep or comfort during the day.
np: शिशु ठूलो हुँदै जाँदा अन्तिम महिनाहरूमा अमिलो डकार आउनु (छाती पोल्ने समस्या) निकै सामान्य हुन्छ।
यसले तपाईंको निद्रा बिगार्न सक्छ वा दिनको समयमा असहज बनाइदिन सक्छ।

en: Try drinking milk or eating yogurt to soothe the burning.
Avoid foods that trigger heartburn and eat smaller, frequent meals.
If heartburn is very uncomfortable, consult your health worker for advice.
np: छाती पोल्ने पीडा कम गर्न दूध पिउनुहोस् वा दही जस्ता खानेकुरा लिनुहोस्।
अमिलो डकार गराउने खानेकुरा नखानुहोस् र सानो–सानो मात्रामा पटक–पटक खाना खानुहोस्।
यदि अमिलो डकार आउने समस्या अत्यन्त असहज छ भने, सल्लाहको लागि आफ्नो स्वास्थ्यकर्मीसँग परामर्श गर्नुहोस्।

sentence: Constipation is a common symptom in third_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Constipation is quite common in the third trimester, so try not to worry.
Stay hydrated, eat fiber-rich foods, and engage in gentle exercise to help alleviate discomfort.
If you haven't found relief in a few days, or if you feel severe discomfort, it's a good idea to chat with your healthcare provider.

en: You may feel uncomfortable and have difficulty passing stools.
This is common due to changes in your body and hormones.
np: गर्भावस्थाको सुरुवातमा दिसा गर्न गाह्रो र असहज महसुस हुन सक्छ।
शरीरमा हुने हर्मोनको परिवर्तनका कारण यस्तो हुनु सामान्य कुरा हो।

en: Eat more fruits, vegetables, and whole grains to add fiber to your diet.
Drink plenty of water throughout the day.
Try to walk or do light exercises daily.
If you feel too uncomfortable, talk to your local health worker.
np: आहारमा फाइबर बढाउन फलफूल, सागसब्जी र साबुत अन्न (whole grains) बढी खानुहोस्।
दिनभरि प्रशस्त पानी पिउनुहोस्।
हरेक दिन हल्का व्यायाम वा हिँडडुल गर्न प्रयास गर्नुहोस्।
यदि असहजता धेरै भयो भने, नजिकको स्वास्थ्यकर्मीको सल्लाह लिनुहोस्।

en: You may have harder stools and more difficulty passing them.
Your growing baby might press on your intestines, slowing down movement.
np: यस चरणमा दिसा कडा हुन सक्छ र गर्न झन् गाह्रो महसुस हुन सक्छ।
बढ्दो शिशुको कारण आन्द्रामा चाप पर्न गई पाचन प्रक्रिया ढिलो हुन सक्छ।

en: Include plenty of dal, beans, and leafy greens in your meals.
Drink enough water to keep your body hydrated.
Do light exercises like walking or yoga if possible.
If it's very uncomfortable, consult your local health worker.
np: खानामा दाल, गेडागुडी र कोसे साग पर्याप्त रूपमा समावेश गर्नुहोस्।
शरीरलाई नमीयुक्त राख्न पर्याप्त पानी पिउनुहोस्।
सकिन्छ भने हिँडडुल वा हल्का योगजस्ता व्यायाम गर्नुहोस्।
यदि अत्यधिक असहज महसुस भयो भने, स्वास्थ्यकर्मीको सल्लाह लिनुहोस्।

en: You may have more discomfort and difficulty due to the baby's size.
There might be more pressure on your lower body.
np: शिशुको आकार ठूलो हुँदै जाँदा तपाईंलाई दिसा गर्न बढी असुविधा र कठिनाइ हुन सक्छ।
तलको भागमा चाप पर्न जान्छ।

en: Eat smaller meals with more fruits and vegetables throughout the day.
Drink water regularly to help with digestion.
Do light walking or stretching if you can.
If it's very bothering, gently talk to your local health worker.
np: दिनभरि सानो-सानो मात्रामा फलफूल र सागसब्जीयुक्त खाना खाने गर्नुहोस्।
पाचन सहज बनाउन नियमित रूपमा पानी पिउनुहोस्।
सकिन्छ भने हल्का हिँडडुल वा तन्किने व्यायाम गर्नुहोस्।
यदि समस्या धेरै भयो भने, कृपया नजिकको स्वास्थ्यकर्मीको सल्लाह लिनुहोस्।

sentence: Bloating and gas is a common symptom in third_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Dear mother, bloating and gas are quite common in the third trimester due to hormonal changes and the growing uterus pressing on your intestines.
Try eating smaller, more frequent meals and stay hydrated.
Gentle exercise and staying upright after meals can help alleviate discomfort.
If the bloating becomes severe or is accompanied by other concerning symptoms, it's a good idea to check in with your healthcare provider for peace of mind.

en: You may feel full and have gas more often.
This is common as your body changes and makes room for your baby.
It can also be uncomfortable but usually nothing to worry about.
np: गर्भावस्थाको सुरुवातमा पेट फुल्न सक्छ र ग्यास बढी हुन सक्छ।
शरीरमा परिवर्तन आउँदा र शिशुका लागि ठाउँ बनाउँदा यस्तो हुनु सामान्य हो।
यो अलिकति असहज त लाग्न सक्छ, तर प्रायः चिन्ताको विषय हुँदैन।

en: Try eating smaller meals throughout the day instead of big ones.
Avoid foods that cause too much gas or bloating.
Drink plenty of water each day.
Talk to your local health worker if you feel a lot of discomfort.
np: एकैचोटि धेरै खानेभन्दा, दिनभरि सानो-सानो मात्रामा खाना खानुहोस्।
धेरै ग्यास वा पेट फुल्ने समस्या निम्त्याउने खानेकुराहरू नखानुहोस्।
दिनभरि प्रशस्त पानी पिउनुहोस्।
यदि धेरै असहज महसुस हुन्छ भने, कृपया नजिकको स्वास्थ्यकर्मीको सल्लाह लिनुहोस्।

en: Your growing baby is pressing on your stomach and intestines.
This can cause bloating and gas, which can be uncomfortable.
It is usually nothing to worry about during this stage.
np: बढ्दो शिशुले पेट र आन्द्रामा चाप पारेका कारण ग्यास वा पेट फुल्ने समस्या हुन सक्छ।
यो असहज लाग्न सक्छ, तर सामान्य गर्भावस्थाको हिस्सा हो।
यस चरणमा सामान्यतया पेट फुल्नु र ग्यास हुनु गम्भीर समस्या होइन।

en: Eat slowly and avoid overeating.
Try to have smaller, more frequent meals.
Walking gently can help move the gas.
If it bothers you a lot, it's a good idea to talk to your local health worker.
np: खाना विस्तारै खानुहोस् र धेरै नखानुहोस्।
सानो मात्रामा पटक–पटक खाना खाने प्रयास गर्नुहोस्।
हल्का हिँडडुल गर्दा ग्यास बाहिर जान सहयोग पुर्‍याउँछ।
यदि ग्यासले धेरै असहज महसुस हुनुहुन्छ भने, स्वास्थ्यकर्मीको सल्लाह लिनुहोस्।

en: As your baby grows bigger, there is less room for your stomach and intestines.
This can cause more bloating and gas, which can be uncomfortable but is usually normal.
It might feel different from the gas you had earlier in your pregnancy.
np: शिशु ठूलो हुँदै जाँदा पेट र आन्द्राका लागि ठाउँ कम हुन जान्छ।
यसले ग्यास र पेट फुल्ने समस्या झनै बढाउन सक्छ, जुन असहज त लाग्न सक्छ तर सामान्य हो।
पहिलेको गर्भावस्थामा भएको ग्यासभन्दा फरक महसुस हुन सक्छ।

en: Eat slowly and have smaller meals more often.
Avoid foods that cause too much gas.
Take slow, gentle walks to help the gas move.
If you feel a lot of discomfort or pain, calmly visit your local health worker.
np: खाना विस्तारै खानुहोस् र दिनभरि सानो-सानो मात्रामा खाने गर्नुहोस्।
ग्यास बढी गराउने खानेकुराहरू नखानुहोस्।
ग्यासको समस्या कम गर्न हल्का हिँडडुल गर्नु उपयुक्त हुन्छ।
यदि असहजता वा दुखाइ धेरै भयो भने, नजिकको स्वास्थ्यकर्मीकोमा जानुहोस्।

sentence: Swelling (edema) is a common symptom in third_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Swelling is quite common in the third trimester, so try not to worry too much.
Remember to elevate your feet when possible and stay hydrated.
If the swelling becomes severe or sudden, or if it's accompanied by other symptoms like headaches or vision changes, it's important to contact your healthcare provider promptly.

en: Swelling is normal but can be uncomfortable.
Feet and ankles may feel tight in shoes.
Rings may not fit well on fingers.
np: शरीर सुन्निनु गर्भावस्थाको सुरुवातमा सामान्य भए पनि असहज लाग्न सक्छ।
जुत्तामा खुट्टा र गोलीगाँठो तन्किएको वा कसेको महसुस हुन सक्छ।
औंलामा लगाउने औंठी कसिएको वा अटाउन गाह्रो हुन सक्छ।

en: Rest with feet elevated when you can.
Wear comfortable shoes and slippers.
Drink plenty of water; it's okay to have some extra salt in your food.
If face or hands swell suddenly, or you have headaches, tell your health worker.
np: जहिले सक्नुहुन्छ खुट्टा माथि उठाएर आराम गर्नुहोस्।
सजिलो हुने खालका चप्पल वा जुत्ता लगाउनुहोस्।
पर्याप्त मात्रामा पानी पिउनुहोस्। खानामा थोरै नुन बढी भएको भए पनि समस्या हुँदैन।
यदि अनुहार वा हात एक्कासि सुन्निने, टाउको दुख्ने जस्ता लक्षण देखिएमा स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई भन्नुहोस्।

en: Swelling may increase in feet, ankles, hands, and face.
May feel more tired or heavy.
Sometimes, swelling can be a sign of too much blood pressure.
np: खुट्टा, गोलीगाँठो, हात र अनुहारमा सुन्निने समस्या बढ्न सक्छ।
शरीर भारी भएको वा थकाइ लागेको महसुस हुन सक्छ।
कहिलेकाहीं, सुन्निनु उच्च रक्तचापको संकेत पनि हुन सक्छ।

en: Take breaks and elevate your feet during the day.
Wear loose, comfortable clothing.
If swelling in face or hands is sudden or severe, or if you have headaches or see spots, tell your health worker.
Keep drinking plenty of water.
np: दिनभरि बीच–बीचमा विश्राम लिनुहोस् र खुट्टा माथि उठाएर बस्नुहोस्।
खुल्ला र सजिलो लुगा लगाउनुहोस्।
यदि अनुहार वा हात एक्कासि वा धेरै सुन्निन्छ, टाउको दुख्छ वा आँखामा धब्बा देखिन्छ भने, स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई भन्नुहोस्।
पर्याप्त मात्रामा पानी पिउनुहोस्।

en: Swelling may be quite noticeable, which is usually normal.
Feet, ankles, hands, and face may be puffy.
Sometimes, sudden swelling can be a sign of high blood pressure.
np: गर्भावस्थाको अन्त्यतिर शरीर सुन्निएको प्रष्ट देखिन सक्छ, जुन सामान्य हो।
खुट्टा, गोलीगाँठो, हात र अनुहार फुलेको जस्तो देखिन सक्छ।
तर एक्कासि अत्यधिक सुन्निने अवस्था, उच्च रक्तचापको संकेत पनि हुन सक्छ।

en: Rest on your left side to reduce swelling.
Elevate your feet when sitting or lying down.
If you have a sudden bad headache, see spots, or have quick weight gain, tell your health worker right away.
Keep drinking water and eating healthy foods.
np: सुन्निएको कम गर्न बायाँ कोल्टे परेर सुत्नुहोस्।
बस्दा वा सुत्दा खुट्टा माथि उठाएर राख्नुहोस्।
यदि एक्कासि टाउको धेरै दुख्ने, आँखामा धब्बा देखिने वा तौल चाँडै बढ्ने जस्ता समस्या देखिएमा तुरुन्त स्वास्थ्यकर्मीलाई जानकारी दिनुहोस्।
पर्याप्त पानी पिउनुहोस् र पौष्टिक खाना खानुहोस्।

sentence: Back pain is a common symptom in third_trimester of pregnancy
recommendation_to_mother: Back pain is quite common in the third trimester, as your body prepares for childbirth.
Remember to practice good posture, use supportive chairs, and avoid lifting heavy objects.
Gentle exercises and stretches can help alleviate the discomfort.
If the pain becomes severe or is accompanied by other concerning symptoms, it's important to contact your healthcare provider.
Stay hydrated and listen to your body's needs. You're doing great, mom!

en: Back pain in early pregnancy is common. It is usually due to your body changing to make room for your baby.
You may feel tired and have some discomfort in your lower back.
np: गर्भावस्थाको सुरुवातमा ढाड दुख्नु सामान्य हो। तपाईंको शरीरले शिशुका लागि ठाउँ बनाउँदै गर्दा यस्तो हुन सक्छ।
थकाइ महसुस हुन सक्छ र कम्मरको भागमा असहजता हुन सक्छ।

en: Rest whenever you can. Lie down on your side with a pillow between your knees to support your back.
